parameters.name: AppId
parameters.description: The application ID, which can be obtained by calling the [ListEdgeContainerApps](~~ListEdgeContainerApps~~) operation.

parameters.name: VersionId
parameters.description: The ID of the version that you want to delete. To obtain the version ID, call the [ListEdgeContainerAppVersions](~~ListEdgeContainerAppVersions~~) operation.
